page.title: 05A typical day
page.content: My name is Shona Cox and I am 8.5 years old.I live in St.Pauls Cray Village.I get up at half past seven and I get dressed.I go down stairs and have breakfast and then I do my lunch box.At half past eight I go to school.The bell goes at five to nine and we go into our classroom.We read a book while our teacher calls the register.At quarter past nine we go to assembley.Assembly is when we meet together and sing songs like Â£Praise the Lord in the rhythm of your music' and Â£Whatever you do'.Then we go back to the classroom and do some work such as maths or our project about the Normans.At half past ten we go out play.I play with my best friends,Jenny, Zoe,Lisa and Reyna.We come in at quarter to eleven and we may write a story or have a test.(Cont. on p.6)
